com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.adapter

Class SQLiteTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.storage.sqlite.adapter.SQLiteTable

  • public final class SQLiteTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Adapts a ModelSchema with additional information to assist in representing and processing a SQLite table.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SQLiteTable.Builder
      A builder to construct immutable SQLite table.

    • Method Detail

      • fromSchema

        public static SQLiteTable fromSchema(ModelSchema modelSchema)
        Static method to convert an instance of ModelSchema into a SQLite table representation. This representation will be useful for storage engine when interacting with SQLite database. Instances of ModelField inside the schema will be converted to SQLiteColumn if they meet the following conditions: 1) field is NOT a associated with another model OR, 2) field is the foreign key of relationship The generated SQLite column will encapsulate additional information that is not contained inside ModelField, such as 1) which table (model) does this field belong to?, 2) what is the corresponding SQLite data type for field type, 3) whether the field represents a foreign key, AND 4) IF it is a foreign key, then which model does it it identify?
        Parameters:
        modelSchema - An instance of ModelSchema
        Returns:
        Adapted SQLite table

      • builder

        public static SQLiteTable.Builder builder()
        Returns a builder to construct SQLite table instance.
        Returns:
        a builder instance

      • getPrimaryKeyColumnName

        public java.lang.String getPrimaryKeyColumnName()
        Returns the column name of primary key. Return "id" if no column identifies as primary key.
        Returns:
        the column name of primary key
